description.synopsis: Utilities for writing GHC type-checker plugins
description.description:
Utilities for writing GHC type-checker plugins, such as
creating constraints, with a stable API covering multiple
GHC releases.

package-flags.name: deverror
package-flags.description: Enables `-Werror` for development mode and TravisCI
